thread.section_title: A.Roma Lifestyle Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Comfortable modern hotel
thread.title_full: Comfortable modern hotel - Review of A.Roma Lifestyle Hotel, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: Kerry H
title: Comfortable modern hotel
text:
The hotel is modern and bright. My room had a great view over the garden. Not all rooms have this view. Quiet surroundings. The Room was very comfortable with plenty of storage and facilities. Mini bar of water , minerals, crisps replenished each day. 30 minute bus or tram ride to central Rome. I didn't use the hotel shuttle on this trip.
Room Tip: Ask for garden view, away from the lifts See more room tips
